description: Dive into the world of 3D web experiences with explorations on composable materials, particles, and transitions that bring dynamic animations to life. Discover innovative techniques in creating infinitely scrolling 3D carousels and the accessibility challenges in CAPTCHA design. Learn to adjust font weights in dark mode using variable fonts, and explore the impact of AI on design systems. Get inspired by browser capabilities like CSS subgrid and superellipsed pill shapes, while examining real-world performance optimization strategies.
joke: Why do JavaScript developers prefer coffee? Because they love to see their code 'brew'!
challenge: Challenge of the week: Create a dynamic bookshelf using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Utilize CSS Grid or Flexbox for layout, and enhance it with 3D animations using WebGL or Canvas for book covers. Add interactivity by allowing users to 'flip' through books, revealing additional content or animations. Aim for accessibility, ensuring the bookshelf is navigable via keyboard and screen readers. This exercise encourages exploring creative design and interactivity without relying on frameworks, though integration with Three.js for extra flair is welcome.
